parts.text:
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF11240060), indicating it's likely associated with an official campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly promotes REPER, a political party participating in the parliamentary elections, by urging voters to vote for them and displaying their position on the ballot (#19). This directly fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, it's designed to reach a wide audience, not just individuals. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective is to encourage voters to choose REPER in the upcoming elections. The message "Votează cu încredere, nu cu frică!" ("Vote with confidence, not with fear!") directly aims to influence voting behavior. This clearly satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks journalistic objectivity. It's promotional material, not news or analysis. It doesn't provide information about the electoral process but advocates for a specific party.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The message is not a personal opinion; it's a clear call to action for a specific political party.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>932185282168985</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post promotes REPER party for the parliamentary elections.  The presence of a CMF number, the explicit call to vote for REPER, and the targeted nature of the paid advertisement strongly suggest this is electoral propaganda. The post's design and message are clearly intended to influence voters' choices. While the post doesn't directly mention specific candidates' names, it promotes the party itself, which is sufficient to constitute electoral propaganda under the provided legal framework. The post's timing is also crucial; if it was published after the official campaign period ended, it would be a clear violation.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>REPER</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>REPER</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
[REPER Brașov], pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 932185282168985) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează Partidul REPER pentru alegerile parlamentare, îndemnând cetățenii să voteze cu încredere pentru acest partid și afișând poziția lor pe buletinul de vot (#19).  Postarea, având un caracter evident electoral și utilizând un număr CMF (CMF11240060), are ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea REPER, constituind astfel propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
